00021 #include "DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "DataSetHeaderReader.h"
00023 #include "FileInput.h"
00024 #include <sys/stat.h>
00025 #include <sys/types.h>
00026 
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 
00029 /*
00030  * Constructor
00031  */
00032 DataGroupHeaderReader::DataGroupHeaderReader()
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Reads all the DataGroupHeaders in a file and the minimum information for each DataSetHeader in every DataGroup.
00038  */
00039 void DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadAllMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, FileHeader& fh, u_int32_t dataGroupCnt)
00040 {
00041         // Get the first data group offset
00042         u_int32_t nextDataGroupFilePos = fh.GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00043 
00044         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < dataGroupCnt; ++i)
00045         {
00046                 // Read the DataGroupHeader
00047                 DataGroupHeader dch;
00048 
00049                 // Move to the indicated position in the file
00050                 fileStream.seekg(nextDataGroupFilePos, std::ios_base::beg);
00051 
00052                 nextDataGroupFilePos = ReadMinimumInfo(fileStream, dch);
00053                 fh.AddDataGroupHdr(dch);
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * Reads all the DataGroupHeaders in a file and all information for each DataSetHeader in every DataGroup.
00059  */
00060 void DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadAll(std::ifstream& fileStream, FileHeader& fh, u_int32_t dataGroupCnt)
00061 {
00062         // Get the first data group offset
00063         u_int32_t nextDataGroupFilePos = fh.GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00064 
00065         for (u_int32_t i = 0; i < dataGroupCnt; ++i)
00066         {
00067                 // Read the DataGroupHeader
00068                 DataGroupHeader dch;
00069 
00070                 // Move to the indicated position in the file
00071                 fileStream.seekg(nextDataGroupFilePos, std::ios_base::beg);
00072 
00073                 nextDataGroupFilePos = Read(fileStream, dch);
00074                 fh.AddDataGroupHdr(dch);
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Reads the DataGroupHeader and the minimum information for all DataSetHeaders associated with this DataGroupHeader from the file.
00080  */
00081 u_int32_t DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadMinimumInfo(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00082 {
00083         u_int32_t dataSetCnt = ReadHeader(fileStream, dch);
00084 
00085         // Read the DataSets
00086         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00087         dphReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(fileStream, dch, dataSetCnt);
00088         return dch.GetNextGroupPos();
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*
00092  * Read the DataGroupHeader and all DataSetHeaders associated with this DataGroupHeader from the file.
00093  */
00094 u_int32_t DataGroupHeaderReader::Read(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00095 {
00096         u_int32_t dataSetCnt = ReadHeader(fileStream, dch);
00097 
00098         // Read the DataSets
00099         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00100         dphReader.ReadAll(fileStream, dch, dataSetCnt);
00101         return dch.GetNextGroupPos();
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*
00105  * Reads the DataGroupHeader from the file.  Doesn't read all DataSetHeader information.
00106  */
00107 u_int32_t DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadHeader(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00108 {
00109         ReadNextDataGroupFilePos(fileStream, dch);
00110         ReadFirstDataSetFilePos(fileStream, dch);
00111         u_int32_t dataSetCnt = ReadDataSetCnt(fileStream, dch);
00112         ReadDataGroupName(fileStream, dch);
00113         return dataSetCnt;
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*
00117  * Reads the file position of the next DataGroup from the file.
00118  */
00119 void DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadNextDataGroupFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00120 {
00121         //DEBUG
00122         //u_int32_t z = fileStream.tellg();
00123 
00124         dch.SetNextGroupPos(FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream));
00125 }
00126 
00127 /*
00128  * Reads the file position of the first DataSet in the DataGroup.
00129  */
00130 void DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadFirstDataSetFilePos(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00131 {
00132         //DEBUG
00133         //u_int32_t z = fileStream.tellg();
00134 
00135         dch.SetDataSetPos(FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream));
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*
00139  * Reads the number of DataSets in the current DataGroup from the file.
00140  */
00141 u_int32_t DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadDataSetCnt(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00142 {
00143         //DEBUG
00144         //u_int32_t z = fileStream.tellg();
00145 
00146         return FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00147 }
00148 
00149 /*
00150  * Reads the DataGroup name from the file.
00151  */
00152 void DataGroupHeaderReader::ReadDataGroupName(std::ifstream& fileStream, DataGroupHeader& dch)
00153 {
00154   //DEBUG
00155         //u_int32_t z = fileStream.tellg();
00156 
00157         dch.SetName(FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream));
00158 }
